name: io.github.abhichandra21/promptheus
description: AI-powered prompt refinement with adaptive questioning and multi-provider support (6+ LLM backends)

environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key (optional, at least one provider required)
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Anthropic Claude API key (optional, at least one provider required)
environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key (optional, at least one provider required)
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Groq API key (optional, at least one provider required)
environmentVariables.name: GROQ_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Alibaba Qwen API key (optional, at least one provider required)
environmentVariables.name: QWEN_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Zhipu GLM API key (optional, at least one provider required)
environmentVariables.name: GLM_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Override provider selection (gemini, anthropic, openai, groq, qwen, glm)
environmentVariables.name: PROMPTHEUS_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Override model selection for the chosen provider
environmentVariables.name: PROMPTHEUS_MODEL
